file_content.text: It's a miracle this thing hasn't exploded a thousand times over after what you put it through.
It's not a miracle if it's meant to be. I'm living proof that all you need is faith.
Uh-huh. Like how you and Miss Spooky Eyes are destined to be together?
Lana adores me. When the time's right, we'll be together. You'll see.
I found HK wandering Asylum with no memory of anything since he left.
Whew! I mean, that's probably bad. Where's the Outlander?
Exactly.
Senya wanted your friend and HK to meet her contacts. She gave them coordinates to the location.
Apology: I have no such data stored in memory.
Senya.... I knew it!
I believe her contacts are the real danger. HK, what's the first thing you remember after you woke up?
His destiny is to fall. We have foreseen that much. But his final fate remains unclear. When he is at your mercy, what will you do?
I want Senya to answer first.
Senya?
Mercy? I don't know the meaning of the word.
I'll destroy him.
Death is not always the answer. Even for a man like Arcann, there are other ways to atone.
There's been enough death.
Arcann will not escape justice for the lives he's taken.
A thousand Scions lie dead because of him. Blood calls out for blood. Do you agree?
Answer us.
They question her commitment to them.... because they cannot foresee it. Ask yourself why.
If you are not with us, you stand against the tides of destiny. Arcann and Vaylin must die.
Don't worry about her. I'm on it.
Forget her. You've got me.
If that is their destiny, then they will fall.
Maybe you're right.
Justice can take many different forms. We'll do what's right when the time comes.
Justice, not vengeance.
I'm starting to second guess whether or not we need you.
I don't like your tone.
She tied herself to your fate, and you to hers. The future must not remain uncertain.
If you will not reveal your true self, you leave me no choice.
You act as if you have a choice. We know our part. It's yours that must be revealed.
I will know your fate even if I must tear you open to see it.
It is not their destiny that concerns me. It is yours.
You seek to remove Arcann from the Eternal Throne. As well you should.
Uh-huh. I'd say you're living proof that Miss Spooky Eyes is a lot more patient than she looks.
Isn't there anything you still need to fix around here?
Nope! I'm just too good at my job.
